title: Dialog: UX do
code:
<gds-flex padding="xl" width="100%" justify-content="center" alig-items="center">
<gds-dialog heading="Cancel the application" >
  <gds-button slot="trigger">Open dialog</gds-button>
  <gds-text tag="p">
  If you cancel, nothing will be saved and you'll need to start again if you still want to apply.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-flex slot="footer" gap="s">
    <gds-button rank="secondary">Back</gds-button>
    <gds-button>Cancel application</gds-button>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-dialog>
</gds-flex>
